name: Emoji Winner
description:
Emoji Winner is a new addictive and creative fun number game. It looks easy at first but will be challenging later. You can kill time with it or play with your friends and families.

Just tap emoji and merge emoji!

How to play:
Tap the emoji to add 1 to it, then eliminate it with the same emoji around it. its so that simple but exciting.
Match at least 3 same emoji to eliminate.
You can get bonus by eliminate more times and for more points.
There is no time limit, so keep playing. Just merge emoji and get high scores!

Top Features:
- Emoji Winner is very Easy to play & very funny.
- Simple graphic, high performance, and smooth effect.
- You can get bonus when you gain combos.

It's super simple and funny! Try to eliminate more emoji, to merge and get higher numbers!
